title: Perry's Victory & International Peace Memorial: Park Home
body: Welcome to Perry's Victory  Perry's Victory and International Peace Memorial was established to honor those who fought in the Battle of Lake Erie, during the War of 1812, and to celebrate the long-lasting peace among Britain, Canada and the U.S. The Memorial, a Doric column, rising 352 feet over Lake Erie is situated 5 miles from the longest undefended border in the world.                Current Job Opportunities   Have you ever wanted to work for the NPS now is your chance.
